about_the_game:
One Minute To Close is a stealth sandbox game about sneaking into a supermarket just after closing time, where every footstep and clattering object could announce your presence. As a stealth shopper on a late-night mission, your objective is to gather all the items on your shopping list without alerting the shop assistants that roam the aisles.

  • Move silently through the darkened aisles, evading the watchful gaze of the shop assistants as you collect items from your list.

  • Explore a fully interactive supermarket environment filled with hiding spots and obstacles to overcome, knock over displays, distract the shopping assistants with noisy distractions, or create makeshift barricades to impede pursuit.

  • The shop assistants utilise artificial intelligence that adapts and learns from your movements, making each encounter more intense than the last. Use the sandbox environment to your advantage to outmanoeuvre and outsmart your adversaries.
